resources.string: Search in any field (title/author/note/content fields, etc.) of bibliographies by using any word.
Search in title fields (book/periodical/series title, etc.) of bibliographies by using some beginning words of title.
Search in title fields (book/periodical/series title, etc.) of bibliographies by using any keyword of title.
Search in author fields (personal/family/organization/meeting name, etc.) of bibliographies by using the last name first.
Search in author fields (personal/family/organization/meeting name, etc.) of bibliographies by using any keyword of author name.
Search in subject fields (subjects/keywords, etc.) of bibliographies by using any subject term or keyword. Such as: programming
Search in publisher fields of bibliographies by using publisher name. Such as Harvard University Press, Boker, etc.
Search in class fields of bibliographies by using Chinese Classification Code. Such as TP311
Search in number fields of bibliographies by using ISBN (International Standard Book Number). Such as: 7–121–03217–1, 978–7–301–13449–8
Search in number fields of bibliographies by using ISSN (International Standard Series Number). Such as 0253–41777
Search in collect fields of bibliographies by using Call Number. Call Number consists of classification code and distinguish code, and separated by \'/\'. Such as B9–43/M12
